user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my everyday bras, ensuring they fit well and provided a smooth look under clothing.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a bra that provided a perfect fit and extra coverage, especially for sleeveless outfits. The features of elastic-free sides and back appealed to me as they promised comfort and a smooth silhouette. The positive review about the fit reinforced my decision.

Comfort was my main priority, and this wireless bra's description highlighted its cool, comfortable support without wires. The emphasis on moisture-wicking and cushioned straps made it an attractive option for all-day wear. The positive feedback about the fit further validated my choice.

I wanted a bra that was versatile for both workouts and casual wear. The seamless design and moisture-wicking fabric were key features that caught my attention. Although I appreciated the comfort, I was slightly disappointed with the non-adjustable straps, which affected my overall satisfaction.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, good fit, and quality materials. I value items that are soft against the skin, have a flattering silhouette, and are versatile enough for various occasions. I appreciate when clothing maintains its shape and color after washing, and I tend to favor tagless designs for added comfort. Additionally, I enjoy products that provide good value for money, even if they are slightly higher in price. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, have thin or low-quality fabric, or lack adjustability in features like straps. I also find it unappealing when products do not fit comfortably or do not wash well, leading to a loss of shape or size.

conversation.content: I want to find everyday bras that are comfortable, supportive, and provide a smooth look under clothing. within my expected price range: [14.99, 28.14]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. With high neckline, great for anyone looking for extended coverage. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Tame Your Tummy Shaping Lace Brief with Cool Comfort Dm0051> / Item ID: B0BTQ5MYJG / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for firm control shapewear with all-day comfort, you've found it with Maidenform®'s firm control briefs from the Tame Your Tummy collection. The brief silhouette, available with allover fabric or with a pretty stretch lace panty, is designed with a wide, toning waist panel for all-around smoothing that's effective yet comfortable. This firm control panty has a Smart Comfort® waistband that won't roll, dig or pinch, plus it's made with Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to help you stay cool and dry. And it has a cotton-lined gusset for added comfort. You'll be delighted with the comfort of this firm control brief shaper that you can really wear all day long."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."]
